price: Ahubwo Allah (wenyine) ube ari We ugaragira, kandi ube mu bashimira.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
